DOC.brief_summary: Angiographies supra-aortic vessel magnetic image become common recently . So purpose study evaluate image potential different contrast agent . Three contrast agent magnetic resonance imaging compare angiography supra-aortic artery intraindividual study 10 patient . All application contrast agent perform flow 2 ml/s . One contrast medium applicated second time reduce flow 1 ml/s . The angiography supra-aortic vessel evaluate two experienced reader consensus read . The signal/noise- contrast/noise-ratio anatomic vessel segment carotic vertebral artery measure compare .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Diagnostic Accuracy Magnetic Imaging Angiographies Supra-Aortic Vessels Three Different Magnetic Resonance Contrast Agents Patients
